channel.title: irc on Philomath's Lair!
channel.description: Recent content in irc on Philomath's Lair!

item.title: Weechat relaying
item.description: Elitebnc after being in service for more than 5 years, is shut in January 2020 and many ghosts who was relying on Elitebnc bouncer to exist, were being exorcised. IRC all the way? (how to remain online on IRC everysecond) Bouncers? I was on elitebnc for quite sometime, until they shut down Why not quassel or IRCcloud? Maxking wrote a post on persistent irc setup and shared his reasons to use weechat over everything else.

item.title: Setting up Tor to connect to IRC network
item.description: Freenode to EliteBNC bouncer to Tor! First time I connected to IRC using webchat.freenode.net web portal with no encryption and IP hiding. With time, I moved to EliteBNC bouncer to read all the messages even when I am offline. Now, the time has demanded me to evolve a bit further. This is an instructable blog post on how to set up “Tor” proxy to connect to my #dgplug folks. The Onion Routing Protocol!
